# Setup
```{r}
#| message: false
#| output: "hide"
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)
```


# Source Funs

```{r}
#| message: false
#| output: "hide"
fun_files <- list.files(path = "funs", pattern = "\\.R$", full.names = TRUE)
map(fun_files, source)
```


# Parameters

```{r}
n_colleagues <- 3
p <- 3
o <- 10
dep <- 0
```






# Sensitivity 1


```{r pop-grid}
#| output: false
tic()
grid <- populate_grid(n_colleagues = 2:5, 
                      o = c(5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30), 
                      p = c(3, 5, 7, 10), 
                      dep = 0)
toc()
```



# Visualize grid


```{r vis-grid}
#| fig-width: 9
#| fig-asp: 1.5
vis_grid(grid)
```
